alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 9:57PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1030 PM MST... At 956 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estrella Sailport, or 15 miles west of Sun Lakes, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Avondale, Maricopa, South Mountain Park, Estrella Sailport, South Phoenix, Estrella Mountain Park and Komatke. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 238 between mile markers 34 and 44. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 174 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; West Pinal County
